Find how the census tracts changed from 2010 to 2020 in Delaware

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", out.height="80vh", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(here)
source("../plot_map.R")
plot_map()
```


### Data Sources

US Census Bureau's Cartographic Boundary Files ([2019-onwards](https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/cartographic-boundary.html) & [pre-2018](https://www.census.gov/geographies/mapping-files/time-series/geo/carto-boundary-file.html#:~:text=The%20cartographic%20boundary%20files%20are,for%20small%20scale%20thematic%20mapping);):

- [2010 boundary data](https://www2.census.gov/geo/tiger/GENZ2018/shp/cb_2018_10_tract_500k.zip) (from the 2018 data)
- [2020 boundary data](https://www2.census.gov/geo/tiger/GENZ2020/shp/cb_2020_10_tract_500k.zip)
